com.scottbyrns.ml.neural
Class DefaultSynapse

java.lang.Object
  com.scottbyrns.ml.neural.DefaultSynapse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Synapse, java.io.Serializable
public class DefaultSynapse
extends java.lang.Object
implements Synapse

An artificial synapse that is an abstraction of biological synapses in the form of a weight unit.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Scott Byrns Date: Nov 11, 2010 Time: 9:28:58 AM
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
DefaultSynapse(Neuron source, Neuron destination, double weight)
          Create a new synapse that spans the source and destination neurons provided with the specified weight.
